responses.rationale: The segment discusses the cause of disease spread, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
Reports numerical metric ("23 states have confirmed cases") using standard reporting language.
The segment reports the location of cases, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
Reports numerical metric ("11.7 million turkeys annually") using standard reporting language.
Reports numerical metrics ("leading egg producer", "46 million chickens") using standard reporting language.
Reports numerical metrics ("13 million chickens and 305,000 turkeys") using standard reporting language.
Reports numerical metrics ("22 million birds", etc.) using standard reporting language.
